abstract: The Red Bulls trained at Red Bull Arena instead of at Montclair State University on Tuesday, but Thierry Henry and Rafael Marquez declined to speak with the news media, and Coach Hans Backe said he had yet to see the play on which Henry drew a red card last Saturday.
snippet: The Red Bulls trained at Red Bull Arena instead of at Montclair State University on Tuesday, but Thierry Henry and Rafael Marquez declined to speak with the news media, and Coach Hans Backe said he had yet to see the play on which Henry drew a red...
lead_paragraph: HARRISON, N.J. -- The Red Bulls trained at Red Bull Arena instead of Montclair State University on Tuesday, but Thierry Henry and Rafael Marquez declined to speak with the news media, and Coach Hans Backe said he had yet to see the play on which Henry drew a red card last Saturday.

headline.main: Scenes From a Red Bulls Practice
